data.why:
I would like to submit to CPAN my script outlook2ical.pl , which I
    have been maintaining for several years now. Outlook2Ical is a perl
    script that converts mail messages produced by MS Outlook Calendar
    to .calendar file used by the ical program. It handles appointment
    messages and task requests, in english and hebrew.

meta.subject: PAUSE ID request (MISHA; Michael S. Tsirkin)
